title: Wolf Tooth Supple Lite Bar Tape is thinner, super wide, and impressively durable
content:
Supple is the perfect word to describe Wolf Tooth Component’s first handlebar tape. Their original Supple Bar Tape was a whopping 5mm thick, which when combined with the 40mm width made for some very plush bars. But not everyone needs (or wants) bar tape that thick. So now Wolf Tooth Components has added their Supple Lite […]

The post Wolf Tooth Supple Lite Bar Tape is thinner, super wide, and impressively durable appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
